version_description:
In this version we've done some visual touch-ups in the premium section. We've also made the app less crashy. Yay!

Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we'll continue to follow up on your complaints and suggestions, so stay tuned for more updates!
Includes a new featured section for live wallpaper and other content.
Includes a new featured section for live wallpaper and other content.
Checkout the new Marketplace with lots of new amazing artists.

- Lots of new artists in the marketplace
- Improved deep-link support
Checkout the Marketplace! Lots of now awesome artists.
Checkout the Marketplace! Lots of new awesome artists.
Improved the search feature
Check out the new page that features the content of our premium artists.
Introducing more ways to get credits

- Introducing more ways to get credits
- Minor bugfixes
Check out all the new content.

This time we've made it a tiny bit easier to browse through all the delicious premium content.
We've also made it possible to browse through a selection of phone cases for your phone.

Check out the premium section and let us know what you think!

Thanks!

Introducing Stickers!
We've got a great new feature for you to try out. Find your favourite wallpaper, slather it with stickers and put your own personal touch on your lock screen.

Let us know what you think!

Cheers!

Introducing Stickers!
We've got a great new feature for you to try out. Find your favourite wallpaper, slather it with stickers and put your own personal touch on your lock screen.
Let us know what you think!

Cheers!
• Minor bug and crash fixes

Welcome to Zedge Wallpapers 3.8.3
Stickers is a great new feature for you to try out. Find your favourite wallpaper, slather it with stickers and put your own personal touch on your lock screen.
Let us know what you think!

• Get notifications to collect your daily credits
• Crash fixes

- App icon is now ready for the cozy season!
- Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements

• New purchase dialog.
• Bug fix & enhancements.
• Minor bug fixes
• Bug fixes and crash fixes

• Resolved some issues with WhatsApp Stickers export
• Minor bug and crash fixes

We hope that you love stickers as much as we do. It's much easier to browse and find them all over the app.

In addition some nasty bugs were eliminated and tweaks were made here and there.
• Live Wallpaper playback should now feel more responsive depending on the network connection.
In this version we fixed some localization bugs.
We made the app a bit better by eliminating some small bugs and improved a few features.

- We made stickers more playful, just keep tapping on them for nice alternatives.
- The app's became better after we killed some annoying bugs.

- This version helps you clear your Photo Library from those empty Zedge albums, that were created due to a bug. Sorry for that.
- As usual some annoying bugs were terminated.
We made some upgrades on the artist pages and a few bugs were eliminated too.
Small bug fixes.

- You can share your favourite marketplace items from the app.
- We adjusted a bit on storage usage so the app became slimmer.
- And as usual we tweaked a bit under the hood.

- App icon is now ready for the cozy season!
- Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements
We made the app a bit better by eliminating some small bugs and improved a few features.

Earning credits became more exciting. Tap on your balance and behold the colors.

In addition a few things got polished.
Introducing stickers in Zedge Premium. You can now buy sticker packs and decorate your favourite wallpapers.
We looked under the hood and adjusted some screws to make the engine run more efficiently.
In this version we fixed some localization bugs.
Introducing some new exciting offers where you can earn credits.

We hope that you love stickers as much as we do. It's much easier to browse and find them all over the app.

In addition some nasty bugs were eliminated and tweaks were made here and there.
Keep a look out for limited edition stickers!

- Copy stickers directly to your clipboard and send them to your friends!
- Browse through stickers with ease!
- Various bug-fixes and performance improvements, thanks to your feedback!

• Fixed an issue with opening deep links
• Minor bug fixes
• Live Wallpaper playback should now feel more responsive depending on the network connection.

• Added a new "Merch" tab.
• More options when browsing a Premium Artist.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.
• More Premium ringtones now available!

• New purchase dialog.
• Bug fix & enhancements.

• Look out for more ways to earn Zedge Credits!
• Minor bug fixes
Add your Zedge Stickers to iMessage or WhatsApp!
• Minor bug fixes

• Resolved some issues with WhatsApp Stickers export
• Minor bug and crash fixes
• Bug fixes and crash fixes
• iOS 13 support
• Resolve some UI bugs when using Dark Mode
• Minor bug fixes

• Get notifications to collect your daily credits
• Crash fixes
• Minor bug and crash fixes

- App icon is now ready for the cozy season!
- Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements
- Minor tweaks and bug fixes
- Stability improvements
• New welcome screen
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Bug fixes and improvements
• iOS 14 support.
• Bug fixes.
A totally new version.

• Zedge has been given a facelift
• The app has been rewritten to make it even faster
• Easy access to exclusive content by Verified Creators - lookout for that verified icon.
